tables.name: mysql_drugbank_drugs_main
tables.source_sql: SELECT drugs AS drug_id, casRegistryNumber AS cas_registry_number, genericName AS generic_name, indication, keggCompoundId AS kegg_compound_id FROM mysql_drugbank_drugs_main

tables.source_sql: SELECT drugs AS drug_id, drugCategory AS drug_category FROM mysql_drugbank_drugs_drugcategory

tables.source_sql: SELECT Drug AS drug_id, xRef AS xref FROM mysql_kegg_drug_xref
